mapper.sql:
SELECT p.image_file, p.manufacture_day, p.price, p.prod_detail, p.prod_name, p.prod_no, p.reg_date, p.amount, ROUND(AVG(r.grade),1) AS prod_grade FROM product p, review r
p.prod_name LIKE ('%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%')
p.prod_no = #{searchKeyword}
p.prod_name LIKE ('%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%')
AND p.amount > 0
AND p.price <= #{maxPrice}
AND p.price >= #{minPrice}
AND p.prod_no = r.prod_no(+)
GROUP BY p.image_file, p.manufacture_day, p.price, p.prod_detail, p.prod_name, p.prod_no, p.reg_date, p.amount ORDER BY
p.reg_date DESC
p.price DESC
p.price ASC
prod_grade DESC NULLS LAST
prod_grade ASC NULLS LAST
p.reg_date DESC
